name: OverallPeriodStartLessThanEnd
message: OverallPeriod start date must be earlier than the end date.

name: ExceptionPeriodStartLessThanEnd
message: Period start date must be earlier than end date.

name: ValidityPeriodWeekInMonthInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ExceptionPeriodWeekInMonthInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ValidityPeriodApplicableWeekInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ExceptionPeriodApplicableWeekInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ValidityPeriodApplicableInstanceOfDayWithinMonthInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ExceptionPeriodApplicableInstanceOfDayWithinMonthInstancesUnique
message: weekInMonth instances must be unique.

name: ExceptionPeriodStartNotLessThanOverallPeriodStart
message: Period start date must not be earlier than overall period start date.

name: ExceptionPeriodEndNotMoreThanOverallPeriodEnd
message: Period end date must not be later than overall period end date.

name: ValidPeriodStartNotLessThanOverallPeriodStart
message: Period start date must not be earlier than overall period start date.

name: ValidPeriodEndNotMoreThanOverallPeriodEnd
message: Period end date must not be later than overall period end date.

name: ValidPeriodStartLessThanEnd
message: Period start date must be earlier than end date.

name: ValidPeriodRecurringTimePeriodOfDayStartLessThanEnd
message: Period start time must be earlier than end time.

name: ExceptionPeriodRecurringTimePeriodOfDayStartLessThanEnd
message: Period start time must be earlier than end time.

name: TaInSwaCodes
message: The 'ta' value must be one of the recognised SWA codes.

name: PublicationTimeAge
message: The 'publicationTime' must be less than one month in the past, and not in the future

name: ExternalReferenceLastUpdateDate
message: The 'lastUpdateDate' must be in the past

name: ValidUsagePeriodStartLessThanEnd
message: 'startValidUsagePeriod' must be lower than 'endValidUsagePeriod'

name: MinTimeLessThanMaxTime
message: 'minTime' must be lower than 'maxTime'

name: MinValueCollectionLessThanMax
message: 'minValueCollection' must be lower than 'maxValueCollection'

name: MinValueLessThanMax
message: 'minValue' must be lower than 'maxValue'

name: ProvisionIndexSequential
message: 'provisionIndex' must match provision's index in the array.

name: RateLineCollectionSequential
message: 'sequence' must match object's index in the array.

name: RateLineSequential
message: 'sequence' must match object's index in the array.

name: HeightCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypeDimensionMaximumHeightWithTRO
message: 'comparisonOperator' must be 'lessThan' or 'lessThanOrEqualTo' and 'vehicleHeight' must must be between 0 and 6.

name: HeightCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypeDimensionMaximumHeightStructural
message: 'comparisonOperator' must be 'lessThan' or 'lessThanOrEqualTo' and 'vehicleHeight' must must be between 0 and 6.

name: LengthCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypeDimensionMaximumLength
message: 'comparisonOperator' must be 'lessThan' or 'lessThanOrEqualTo' and 'vehicleLength' must must be between 0 and 40.

name: WidthCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypeDimensionMaximumWidth
message: 'comparisonOperator' must be 'lessThan' or 'lessThanOrEqualTo' and 'vehicleHeight' must must be between 0 and 6.

name: GrossWeightCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypes
message: Field is required and 'grossVehicleWeight' must must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 50.

name: HeaviestAxleWeightCharacteristicValidForRegulationTypes
message: Field is required and 'heaviestAxleWeight' must must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 50.

name: YearOfFirstRegistrationLessOrEqualToCurrentYearValueInConditions
message: The 'yearOfFirstRegistration' must less than or equal to current year value.

name: YearOfFirstRegistrationLessOrEqualToCurrentYearValueInOverallPeriod
message: The 'yearOfFirstRegistration' must less than or equal to current year value.
